name: shai-hulud-detector
description: Automated detection skill for Shai-Hulud 2.0 compromise. Scans for IOC files, checks running processes, verifies credentials exposure, scans GitHub repos, and checks workflows.

tools.name: scan_iocs
tools.description: Scans the filesystem for known Shai-Hulud IOC files like setup_bun.js and bun_environment.js

tools.name: check_processes
tools.description: Checks for suspicious running processes related to Shai-Hulud

tools.name: scan_github_workflows
tools.description: Checks GitHub workflow files for malicious modifications

instruction: Use the provided tools to scan the system. Start by scanning for IOC files in the current workspace. Then check running processes. Check GitHub workflows for anomalies. Finally, report any findings.
